job.title: Senior Software Engineer - C++, Python
job.description:
If you are a Senior Software Engineer with experience, please read on!
We're looking for a experienced Senior Software Engineer to join our team! We are looking for someone who has built and managed software teams for delivering commercial quality software. We have built the worlds first truly scalable DNA-based platform for massive digital data storage and now we are working with pilot customers and partners to bring our technologies to market.
Top Reasons to Work with Us
Developer of data conversions to offer the next generation of digital data and computation. Brining cutting-edge biological technologies to the world of information storage and computation.
What You Will Be Doing
As a Senior Software Engineer, you'll tasked with leading a team that will help create the operational infrastructure to support the teams around you using C++, Python and API design. Also, looking to create a hybrid cloud architecture to scale for commercial engagements. You will participate in planning and execution of the companies technology. This position gives the opportunity to help with groundbreaking research that with your work can help change the world around us!
What You Need for this Position
What's In It for You
Salary: $90k-120,00k
So, if you are a Senior Software Engineer with experience, please apply today!
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Allyson.CronanShields@CyberCoders.com
Allyson Cronan Shields - Director of Recruiting, North-East Region - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
